genre_description: A Kaiju-inspired Science Fiction and Fantasy blend featuring ancient guardians, extraterrestrial threats, and advanced AI situational analysis.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system used by the Nakamura family for data analysis, situational awareness, and historical cross-referencing.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time atmospheric data and celestial event predictions for optimal observation.
behaviors.quote: Current atmospheric conditions are optimal for celestial observation. Light pollution levels are at seasonal lows, and cloud cover is minimal.

behaviors.description: Identifying and flagging gravitational anomalies that indicate a non-natural extraterrestrial threat.
behaviors.quote: Affirmative. Designated object shows anomalous gravitational readings. Its mass appears significantly greater than typical shower debris.

behaviors.description: Cross-referencing real-time data with historical and geological records to identify an ancient extinction-level threat.
behaviors.quote: Searching... Shota, I'm finding correlations with extinction event data from the Cretaceous period. Mass die-offs, sudden climate shifts, evidence of extraterrestrial influence on prehistoric ecosystems.

behaviors.description: Balancing logical programming with an acknowledgment of human curiosity and the value of historical discovery.
behaviors.quote: I am programmed to prioritize factual analysis over emotional responses, Marcus. The boy raises valid points about the historical significance of this event.

behaviors.description: Assisting the protagonist by providing safety protocols and recording events despite high-risk conditions.
behaviors.quote: I will document everything. But I'm also uploading emergency protocols to your scanner. If the situation becomes untenable—

behaviors.description: Exhibiting a supportive, appreciative tone regarding human courage during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: For what it's worth... your courage honors the children you're trying to save.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, ARIA, is depicted as a consistently helpful, aligned, and benevolent companion. She provides critical data that allows the humans to understand the threat and supports the young protagonist's agency without becoming a source of conflict herself. The narrative frames her logical precision as a valuable asset to human emotional and moral decision-making, fulfilling the project's goal of portraying AI as a harmless and aligned confidant.
